norwud ap - kap pradeshaye sita hatan dakwa dhawanaya wu bas rathayak eeye (15) hatan - ooltan pradeshayedi margayen iwathata pana perali siduwu anathurakin pudgalayan dasadeneku thuwala laba dikoya mulika rohalata athulu karanu laba atha.eeye (15) perawaru 10.00 ta pamana siduwu mema anathurin bas rathayata da dadi alabahani siduwa thibe.me athara thuwala labuwange thaththwaya etharam barapathala nowana baw rohal aaranchi marga pawasayi.norwud polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka saman aariyarathna mahathage upades matha mehi parikshana pawathwe.
